headline: Blackstone Joins Anthropic Round, Raising Stake to $1 Billion
summary: The world’s largest alternative asset manager is investing $200 million at a $350 billion valuation as part of the Anthropic’s ongoing funding round, according to the people, who asked not to be identified because the information is private.  The funding round hasn’t officially closed and timing or specific terms may change.

headline: Blackstone Founder Steve Schwarzman Aims to Build a Top 10 Private Foundation
summary: The billionaire philanthropist is expected to continue his focus on culture, education and artificial intelligence.

headline: What Analysts Think Is Quietly Reshaping The Blackstone (BX) Story Now
summary: What Is Actually Changing In Blackstone’s Price Target The reset in Blackstone’s fair value estimate from about US$179.78 to US$171.00 reflects analysts tightening their models around more cautious revenue assumptions, with revenue growth now set at roughly 14.07% instead of about 19.67%. At the same time, a small shift in the discount rate from 8.31% to about 8.02% suggests a measured update to the required return used in those models, rather than a wholesale rethink of the story. As you...

headline: Trump's Wall Street Homebuyer Ban Proposal Left Out Of Final Housing Bill Amid Ambiguity, Timing Issues
summary: President Donald Trump's proposal to ban Wall Street investors from purchasing single-family homes hit a roadblock in Congress and did not make it to the final Housing Bill on Monday.
